name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Daniel AMAKER, Appellant

judges: Before EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
JONES, former C. J., did not participate in the decision of this case.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Daniel AMAKER, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM.
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
JONES, former C. J., did not participate in the decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: F. Emmett Fitzpatrick, Dist. Atty., Steven H. Goldblatt, Asst. Dist. Atty., Chief, Appeals Div., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
373 A.2d 455
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Daniel AMAKER, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Oct. 13, 1976.
Decided June 3, 1977.
Harry Siegel, Philadelphia, for appellant.
F. Emmett Fitzpatrick, Dist. Atty., Steven H. Goldblatt, Asst. Dist. Atty., Chief, Appeals Div., for appellee.
Before EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
